hadiths.text: Amr bin Shu'aib on his father's authority said that his grandfather reported: A woman came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and she was accompanied by her daughter who wore two heavy gold bangles in her hands. He said to her: Do you pay zakat on them? She said: No. He then said: Are you pleased that Allah may put two bangles of fire on your hands? Thereupon she took them off and placed them before the Prophet (ﷺ) saying: They are for Allah and His Apostle

chapter.ara-name: باب الْكَنْزِ مَا هُوَ وَزَكَاةِ الْحُلِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: On The Meaning Of Kanz (Treasure) And Zakat On Jewellery
